text.div:
HSPC Blood Pressure Measurement Method/Device Value Set

A set of codes that describe the method or device used to measure a systolic blood pressure.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-bpmeasmethoddevice defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
2102 Pediatric cuff A blood pressure cuff that is sized to use on pediatric paitents
2162 Thigh cuff (24 cm) A blood pressure cuff designed to be used on an individual's thigh
31163 Adult Arm Cuff A blood pressure cuff that is sized to use on an adult upper arm
50577434 Ankle Cuff A blood pressure cuff designed to be used on an individual's ankle

name: HSPC Blood Pressure Measurement Method/Device Value Set
description: A set of codes that describe the method or device used to measure a systolic blood pressure.
